# Glimpse Function 

Glimpse is a simple, intuitive and powerful tool used to get a feel for the structure of a dataset. It provides a comprehensive output of the data frame, summarizing the data and providing an overview.

## What Package Contain It 
Glimpse is available in the `tidyverse` package.

## When to Use It
Glimpse is a great way to quickly summarize and diagnose structure and integrity of a data set. It provides useful information such as the number of variables, the number of observations,
